item.title: At least 2 dead as severe weather impacts the South
item.description: A tornado watch has been issued for 5 million people in parts of east Texas, much of Louisiana, and southern Mississippi.

item.title: WATCH: Bears enjoy frozen pond at New York sanctuary
item.description: Two Syrian brown bears enjoyed a frozen pond in their enclosure at a New York sanctuary. One of them was seen licking, rolling and jumping on the ice
